column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I've been coming here regularly for almost 2 years now
column2: and absolutely love their food. The ramen is amazing
column3: the rice bowls are awesome and the desserts are great too
column5: if you're coming on a Friday or Saturday evening
column6: be prepared to wait for around 35 minutes as it gets very busy. I would also try to avoid drinking the water
column7: as it tastes like it came from a fishbowl
column8: but I won't demote a star
column9: because that's just how good the food is
